mapper.select: /* dressDao.selectDressOne - 드레스룸 상세 */ SELECT SALE_BOARD_RPY_SEQ AS saleBoardRpySeq , SALE_BOARD_SEQ AS saleBoardSeq , GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , ENTR_NO AS entrNo , BUL_TIT_NM AS bulTitNm , BUL_CONT AS bulCont , RPY_LVL AS rpyLvl , PAR_SALE_BOARD_RPY_SN AS parSaleBoardRpySn , QRY_CNT AS qryCnt , LKE_CNT AS lkeCnt , RGST_ID AS rgstId , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , UPDT_ID AS updtId , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , USE_YN AS useYn , IMG_PATH AS imgPath , IMG_NM AS imgNm , RVW_TAG AS rvwTag FROM CLT_SALE_BOARD_RVW WHERE 1 = 1 AND SALE_BOARD_RPY_SEQ = #{saleBoardRpySeq}

/* dressDao.selectDressList - 드레스룸 리스트 */ SELECT SALE_BOARD_RPY_SEQ AS saleBoardRpySeq , SALE_BOARD_SEQ AS saleBoardSeq , GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , ENTR_NO AS entrNo , BUL_TIT_NM AS bulTitNm , BUL_CONT AS bulCont , RPY_LVL AS rpyLvl , PAR_SALE_BOARD_RPY_SN AS parSaleBoardRpySn , QRY_CNT AS qryCnt , LKE_CNT AS lkeCnt , RGST_ID AS rgstId , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , UPDT_ID AS updtId , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , USE_YN AS useYn , IMG_PATH AS imgPath , IMG_NM AS imgNm , RVW_TAG AS rvwTag FROM CLT_SALE_BOARD_RVW WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY SALE_BOARD_RPY_SEQ ASC

/* dressDao.goodsDtlDressList - 드레스룸 */ SELECT SALE_BOARD_RPY_SEQ AS saleBoardRpySeq , SALE_BOARD_SEQ AS saleBoardSeq , GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , ENTR_NO AS entrNo , BUL_TIT_NM AS bulTitNm , BUL_CONT AS bulCont , RPY_LVL AS rpyLvl , PAR_SALE_BOARD_RPY_SN AS parSaleBoardRpySn , QRY_CNT AS qryCnt , LKE_CNT AS lkeCnt , RGST_ID AS rgstId , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , UPDT_ID AS updtId , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , USE_YN AS useYn , IMG_PATH AS imgPath , IMG_NM AS imgNm , RVW_TAG AS rvwTag FROM CLT_SALE_BOARD_RVW WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOODS_CD = #{goodsCd} ORDER BY SALE_BOARD_RPY_SEQ ASC
